rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian design with natural light accentuating minimalist aesthetics, incorporating Vastu principles by orienting the entrance to face north or east. This space includes a foyer and cloakroom.

Spacious open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows along one wall for abundant natural light. Scandinavian design elements such as clean lines and light color palette complement Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the living room, an open dining area with minimalistic decor and ample ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles by aligning its eastward orientation.

openings.description: Large glass door ensuring smooth transition from outdoors, designed for natural light entry in accordance with Vastu.
Floor-to-ceiling windows throughout the living and dining areas to maximize sunlight and maintain Scandinavian aesthetics.
